sentences.en: After leaving the West Szechuan Mercantile Corporation , Chueh - hui and Chueh - min separated.
sentences.cn: 觉慧 和觉民 走出了商业场的前门.

sentences.en: As from Sunday, May 1 st, all fares on the corporation's transport services will be increased by ten pence in the pound.
sentences.cn: 从5月1日即星期日起, 本公司运输费将每磅提高10便士.

sentences.en: But the lawsuit brought against the corporation was not settled until 1920.
sentences.cn: 这场官司一直打到1920年才结束.

sentences.en: Directors of a corporation are trustees for the stockholders.
sentences.cn: 公司的董事对股票持有人来说是个受托人.

sentences.en: He works for a large American corporation.
sentences.cn: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.en: It takes brains to administer upon a large corporation.
sentences.cn: 管理一家大公司需要智慧.

sentences.en: Members of the public would jump at the chance to become part owners of the corporation.
sentences.cn: 一些公众会迫不及待地想要抓住机会成为这家公司的持股人。

sentences.en: Mr Hall is non-committal about the number of jobs that the development corporation has created.
sentences.cn: 霍尔先生并未明确说明开发公司已创造的岗位数量。

sentences.en: News Corporation was headquartered in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 新闻集团的总部设在悉尼。

sentences.en: She is the outgoing head of a large corporation.
sentences.cn: 她是一家大公司即将离职的负责人.

sentences.en: She was determined that she would be equal to any test the corporation put to them.
sentences.cn: 她下定决心要成功应对公司对他们的任何考验。

sentences.en: The company has gone into partnership with Swiss Bank Corporation.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已经和瑞士银行公司建立合作关系.

sentences.en: The inflation did the corporation up.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀使这个公司破产了.

sentences.en: The rule applies where a person owns stock in a corporation.
sentences.cn: 该规定适用于持有公司股票的人。

sentences.en: This check is made out in favor of a food corporation.
sentences.cn: 这张支票的受款人为一家食品公司.

words.tran_cn: 法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的

phrases.tran_cn: 公司所得税；企业增值税
美国联邦存款保险公司
公营公司；市政机关；市镇的自治机关

trans.tran_cn: 大公司，法人，市政委员会
trans.tran_en: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization
